from sys import stdin
input = stdin.readline
for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, x, k) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    v = 0
    for i in range(n):
        v += 1 if abs(a[i] - b[i]) <= k else 0
    print('YES' if v >= x else 'NO')

from math import sqrt, ceil, floor, gcd, log2
import sys
from sys import stdin, stdout
from collections import Counter, defaultdict, OrderedDict, deque
from itertools import combinations, groupby
from time import time
from heapq import heappop, heappush, heapify
t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    (n, x, k) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    cnt = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if abs(a[i] - b[i]) <= k:
            cnt += 1
    if cnt >= x:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    t = t - 1
    (n, x, k) = input().split(' ')
    n = int(n)
    x = int(x)
    k = int(k)

    def rec_sim(char1, char2, start, end, k):
        if start == end:
            if abs(int(char1[start]) - int(char2[start])) <= k:
                x = 1
                return x
            else:
                x = 0
                return x
        mid = int((start + end) // 2)
        left_Score = rec_sim(char1, char2, start, mid, k)
        right_score = rec_sim(char1, char2, mid + 1, end, k)
        return left_Score + right_score
    ross_char = input().split(' ')
    russ_char = input().split(' ')
    score = rec_sim(ross_char, russ_char, 0, n - 1, k)
    if score >= x:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

while t > 0:

    (n, x, k) = input().split(' ')
    n = int(n)
    x = int(x)
    k = int(k)

    def rec_sim(char1, char2, start, end, k):
        if start == end:
            if abs(int(char1[start]) - int(char2[start])) <= k:
                x = 1
                return x
            else:
                x = 0
                return x
        mid = int((start + end) / 2)
        left_Score = rec_sim(char1, char2, start, mid, k)
        right_score = rec_sim(char1, char2, mid + 1, end, k)
        return left_Score + right_score
    ross_char = input().split(' ')

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    t = t - 1
    (n, x, k) = input().split(' ')
    n = int(n)
    x = int(x)
    k = int(k)
    ross_char = input().split(' ')
    russ_char = input().split(' ')
    for i in range(int(n)):
        if abs(int(ross_char[i]) - int(russ_char[i])) <= int(k):
            x = x - 1
            if x == 0:
                print('YES')
                break
    if x != 0:
        print('NO')
